text: (eyata) ohu, (ovunta) mese pævasuveya: “(mage) janataveni! oba avadhanaya kalehuda? mage deviyange sadhakayan kerehi ma sthavarava sitiyadi da, ohu tamange sannidhanayen (nabitvaya vana mema) varaprasadaya ma hata pahala kara tibiyadi da, eya obage æs valata nopedhæ, eya oba pilikul kara dæmuvahot eya anugamanaya karana men ma obata bala kala hækida?”
